name: Reflections the Spa
description: Reflections the Spa at the Nugget Casino Resort in Sparks is an expansive 10,000-square-foot wellness retreat offering comprehensive spa services. The facility includes treatment rooms for massage and body work, an aesthetics center for facials and skin care, a full-service salon, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. The spa's tranquil design incorporates natural elements for a calming experience.
shortDescription: 10,000 sq ft wellness retreat with massage, aesthetics, salon, and fitness center.

faqs.question: How big is Reflections the Spa?
faqs.answer: The spa spans 10,000 square feet with treatment rooms, aesthetics center, salon, and fitness facilities.

faqs.question: Do they have a fitness center?
faqs.answer: Yes, a state-of-the-art fitness center is included with spa access.

faqs.question: Is it part of the Nugget Casino Resort?
faqs.answer: Yes, Reflections the Spa is located within the Nugget Casino Resort in Sparks, easily accessible for hotel guests.
